examples.example: 这本书真的很有意思，让我爱不释手。

translate.english: This book is really very interesting, making me reluctant to put it down.

examples.example: 这次的旅行非常有意思，给我们留下了难忘的回忆。

translate.english: This trip is very interesting and has left us unforgettable memories.

examples.example: 和朋友们一起做游戏真的很有意思，大家都特别开心。

translate.english: Playing games together with friends is really very interesting and everyone is extremely happy.
